answers.text:
Attched below are two examples of fire assesments, one from Ohio and one from Colorado. 
Also check out: www.fireapparatusmagazine.com it should help and provide you with information about third party firms and the services they can provide.

author: Christopher Raths
text:
I am seeking assistance in developing a fire apparatus needs assessment for a New Jersey community with 3 volunteer departments servicing 25,000 full time residents, 60,000 day time residents and 22 square miles. If you know of a firm that can provide analysis or have performed an analysis in house please let me know.
Thanks
Chris Raths
Township Manager
Roxbury New Jersey
rathsc@roxburynj.us
973-448-2002
title: Roxbury Township Manager
